alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 28 at 6:47PM MST until October 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau including Colorado City and Pipe Spring National Monument. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. This warning signals the end of the growing season for northern Mohave County.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
